name: Honey Infused Hydrating Lip Oil
about: What it is: A lip oil powered by Mirsalehi honey and bee garden oils to intensely hydrate lips and lock in moisture with a high-shine and non-sticky finish.Formulation Type: Lip Gloss..Benefits: Hydrating.Highlighted Ingredients: - Mirsalehi Honey: A powerful humectant that attracts and retains moisture..- Mirsalehi Bee Garden Oils: Rich, antioxidant powerhouse oils that replenish, lock in moisture, and add shine..- Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers added hydration and smooths...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with a blend of nourishing Mirsalehi honey, bee garden oils, and hyaluronic acid, this bestselling lip oil delivers long-lasting hydration and high shine to quench chapped lips with juicy a scent and touch of color. Gisouu2019s non-sticky formula smooths and locks in moisture throughout the day...Gisou proudly derives their cruelty-free Mirsalehi honey from their own Gisou Bee Garden in The Netherlands, where the family tradition of beekeeping has continued for six generations...
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide directly onto bare lips or underneath/over your favorite lip product for extra dimension, hydration, and shine....Pro tip:.-For the softest, smoothest finish, cleanse and exfoliate lips before applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I think this product is amazing! I have tried a ton of different lip balms, oils, and treatments, but I really like this lip oil! Here are some descriptions:   Packaging: The applicator of this lip oil is thin and it may take up to 2 dips into the product to get a good amount on your lips. Occasionally, a bit of oil may get on the rim, but you can easily swipe it off with the applicator. The lid screws on pretty tight, so it is not likely to leak inside of your bag. Despite being glass, the tube does not shatter easily. I have dropped this a few times but there is not a single scratch!  Consistency: This lip oil is thin and oily (well duh, it's an oil). It's not sticky when you rub your lips together and hair doesn't stick to it. At first, you may feel a slight graininess due to the glitter pieces, but this disappears in a few minutes as the glitter pieces dissolve (I think they're biodegradable). If you are greatly affected by this, consider buying one of the non-shimmery color options. It does not sit on top of the lips and absorbs into them quite nicely. There is no tingling sensation or plumping ingredients.   Durability: This lip oil lasts about an hour before you may want to reapply it.   Looks: On the lips, this lip oil does not have a vibrant tint. It is like a clear lip gloss with a tiny bit of shimmer. It does not look too glossy or greasy, and it just makes your lips look hydrated.   Taste: Luckily, this lip oil tastes like nothing, maybe a little sweet (because of the honey). I find that really helpful because I hate when lip products taste bitter.   Overall, I think this is a great lip oil! It is perfect for putting on top of other lip products or alone! I would rate it a 9.5/10. Best lip oil I've tried so far!

reviews.review_text: The Gisou Honey Infused Lip Oil in Honey Gold is such a dream! As someone who loves lip products, I was super excited to try this, especially since Iu2019ve used Gisouu2019s hair products before. The shade Honey Gold is a gorgeous, subtle gold shimmer that adds the perfect touch of shine without being over-the-top. The formula is super hydrating and feels lightweight, not sticky, which is a huge win for me. My lips feel so soft and smooth after applying, and I love how the honey infusion adds a little extra nourishment. The only downside? I wish the hydration lasted a bit longer, but overall, itu2019s such a fun addition to my lip routine!
